attributes.action: raise the debate in the House of Commons for the provision of free Doner Kebabs between the hours of 2am and 4am on Sunday mornings for anyone smelling of alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to... 
raise the debate in the House of Commons for the provision of free Doner Kebabs between the hours of 2am and 4am on Sunday mornings for anyone smelling of alcohol.The "free" provision of Doner Kebabs would be funded by the ever increasing tax upon alcohol.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
